requirementList.requirement: The system shall allow users to register with a valid email and password.
The system shall allow users to log in and log out securely.
The system shall restrict access to features based on user roles (e.g., admin, regular user).
The user shall be able to view and update their personal profile information.
The user shall be able to change their password.
The user shall be able to upload a profile picture.
The system shall display a personalized dashboard after user login.
The dashboard shall summarize key user data and provide shortcuts to frequently used features.
The user shall be able to create, view, update, and delete items such as posts, entries, or products.
The system shall validate input data before submission.
The user shall be able to search for content using a keyword-based search bar.
The user shall be able to filter results by predefined categories or attributes.
The system shall notify users of important events via real-time alerts or email.
The user shall be able to view past notifications from a notification center.
The user shall be able to submit forms with validated input fields
The system shall allow users to upload files or documents where applicable.
The system shall integrate with third-party APIs (e.g., payment gateways, maps, social login).
The system shall handle API errors gracefully.
The admin user shall be able to manage users, content, and system configurations.
The admin user shall be able to view usage reports and activity logs.
The user shall be able to export data in formats such as CSV or PDF.
The system shall allow importing data from structured files.
The system shall maintain a log of critical user and system activities for auditing purposes
The system shall enforce role-based access permissions for different features and actions.
The admin user shall be able to assign and revoke roles to/from other users
